name: Civil Engineering
about: The department started offering B.Tech. Programme in Computer Engineering in 1987 with initial intake of 30 students and subsequently raised to 210. Department also started B.Tech programme in Information Technology (IT) in 2006 with present intake of 140 students. Department of Computer Engineering is offering a new undergraduate program from the 2023-24 academic session in Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning (AI & ML) with an average intake of 60.
vision: The aroma of burnt pizza mingled with the faint scent of soldering fumes hung heavy in the air of the computer science department. Posters depicting binary code sunsets and algorithms crafted from pipe cleaners adorned the peeling walls.
mission: The aroma of burnt pizza mingled with the faint scent of soldering fumes hung heavy in the air of the computer science department. Posters depicting binary code sunsets and algorithms crafted from pipe cleaners adorned the peeling walls.

name: Data Science and Artificial Intelligence
about: The department of Data Science and Artificial Intelligence focuses on building expertise in big data analytics, machine learning, and intelligent systems. Students gain exposure to cutting-edge tools, research, and applications that drive innovation in industries ranging from healthcare to finance.
vision: To be a center of excellence in data-driven intelligence, nurturing professionals who can develop ethical, scalable, and impactful AI solutions for global challenges.
mission: To empower students with strong analytical foundations, foster interdisciplinary research, and promote innovations in artificial intelligence and data-driven technologies.
laboratories: Machine Learning Lab, Big Data Analytics Lab, Natural Language Processing Lab

name: Robotics and Industrial Engineering
about: The department of Robotics and Industrial Engineering integrates mechanical systems, automation, and production management to develop efficient, smart, and sustainable industrial solutions. The curriculum emphasizes robotics, control systems, and industrial optimization.
vision: To lead advancements in robotics and industrial systems that redefine automation and sustainable manufacturing practices.
mission: To cultivate engineers capable of designing intelligent robotic systems, optimizing industrial processes, and advancing human-robot collaboration.
laboratories: Robotics Lab, Automation and Control Lab, Industrial Systems Lab

name: VLSI Design and Systems Engineering
about: The department of VLSI Design and Systems Engineering focuses on semiconductor technologies, chip design, and embedded system development. It prepares students to innovate in electronics industries with advanced design methodologies and tools.
vision: To establish a premier hub for semiconductor design and systems innovation, advancing technologies that shape modern computing and communication.
mission: To equip students with deep expertise in VLSI and embedded systems, encourage industry collaborations, and drive research in electronic design automation.
laboratories: VLSI Design Lab, Embedded Systems Lab, Microelectronics Lab

name: Energy Science and Engineering
about: The department of Energy Science and Engineering emphasizes sustainable energy technologies, renewable resources, and energy efficiency. It prepares professionals to address global energy challenges with innovative and eco-friendly solutions.
vision: To pioneer sustainable energy research and education, contributing to a cleaner and more energy-secure future.
mission: To train engineers in advanced energy technologies, foster interdisciplinary solutions, and drive innovation in renewable and sustainable energy systems.
laboratories: Renewable Energy Lab, Energy Systems Simulation Lab, Thermal Engineering Lab

name: Architecture and Planning
about: The department of Architecture and Planning develops creative professionals capable of designing sustainable spaces and urban environments. The program integrates aesthetics, functionality, and environmental responsibility.
vision: To shape future-ready architects and planners who create innovative, inclusive, and sustainable built environments.
mission: To foster design thinking, promote sustainable urban planning, and integrate modern technology with architectural creativity.
laboratories: Design Studio, Urban Planning Lab, Building Materials Lab
